name: Sustainability Business Analyst Curriculum (EQF Level 4)
description: Curriculum for Sustainability Business Analyst at EQF Level 4

role.name: Sustainability Business Analyst
role.description: Analyzes business processes and sustainability performance metrics

modules.name: Sector-Specific Digital Sustainability Applications (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Applying digital sustainability principles to specific industry domains (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainability challenges and opportunities in specific industry sectors.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital sustainability principles must be adapted to sector-specific contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply digital sustainability approaches to address sector-specific challenges.

modules.name: Digital Circular Business Models (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Design business models that leverage digital technologies for circular economy (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify digital business models that support circular economy principles.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies enable resource efficiency and circular value chains.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design business models that leverage digital technologies for sustainability outcomes.

modules.name: Sustainable Business Models for Digital Companies (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Creating viable business models that integrate sustainability principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainable business model patterns for digital products and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how sustainability principles can be integrated into core business models.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design economically viable business models that achieve sustainability objectives.

modules.name: Circular Economy and Lifecycle Thinking (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Analyze product lifecycles and propose circular redesign strategies (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Define circular economy principles and lifecycle assessment methodologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can enable circular business practices.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct product lifecycle analyses and propose circular redesign strategies.

modules.name: Sustainable Business Models for Digital Companies (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Creating viable business models that integrate sustainability principles (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainable business model patterns for digital products and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how sustainability principles can be integrated into core business models.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design economically viable business models that achieve sustainability objectives.

modules.name: Sustainability Data Analysis and Reporting (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Analyzing sustainability data and creating meaningful reports for stakeholders (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify analytical approaches for extracting insights from sustainability data.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how to translate data analysis into actionable sustainability reporting.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct comprehensive analyses of sustainability metrics and produce stakeholder-relevant reports.

modules.name: Sustainability Assessment for Small Organizations
modules.description: Methods and tools for sustainability assessment in resource-constrained contexts

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify appropriate sustainability assessment methods for small organizations.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how to adapt assessment frameworks to resource-constrained contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement practical sustainability measurements in small business environments.

modules.name: Sustainability Frameworks and Standards (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Overview of major sustainability frameworks, regulations, and standards (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)
skills: Familiarity with frameworks like GRI, SDGs

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify major sustainability frameworks, standards, and regulations relevant to digital industries.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Compare different sustainability reporting frameworks and their application contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply appropriate standards to evaluate organizational sustainability performance.

modules.name: Data Analytics for Sustainability (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Use data tools to derive actionable sustainability insights (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify data analysis methods suitable for sustainability contexts and challenges.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Evaluate tools and techniques for data-driven sustainability assessments.
learning_outcomes.skills: Use analytics tools to extract sustainability insights from basic datasets.

modules.name: Work-based Sustainability Project (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Apply sustainability knowledge in real-world workplace settings (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Recognize organizational contexts for sustainability project implementation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain sustainability project management methodologies in workplace settings.
learning_outcomes.skills: Execute a sustainability initiative in a real-world professional environment.

modules.name: Sustainability Assessment and Benchmarking (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Evaluate organizational sustainability performance against relevant benchmarks (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainability assessment methodologies and benchmarking frameworks.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain performance evaluation approaches for digital sustainability initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct comprehensive sustainability assessments and comparative benchmarking.

modules.name: Collaborative Tools for Green Innovation (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Leverage collaborative platforms to drive sustainable innovation processes (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify collaborative digital tools that support sustainability innovation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital collaboration can accelerate green innovation processes.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement collaborative platforms to facilitate sustainability-focused innovation.

modules.name: Human-Centered Design for Sustainable Tech (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Apply human-centered design approaches to create sustainable and inclusive digital technologies (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify principles of human-centered design applicable to sustainable digital technologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the importance of inclusivity and accessibility in sustainable solution development.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply design thinking methodologies to develop user-centered, sustainability-focused digital products.

modules.name: Climate Resilience through Digital Solutions (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Applying digital technologies to enhance climate resilience in organizations and communities (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify climate risks and resilience opportunities addressable through digital technologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain connections between climate adaptation, mitigation, and digital solutions.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design digital interventions that enhance climate resilience in specific organizational contexts.

modules.name: Digital Sustainability in SMEs
modules.description: Work-based strategies to apply digital sustainability in small and medium-sized enterprises

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify the challenges and opportunities of implementing digital sustainability in SMEs.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Recognize appropriate digital tools and workflows to enhance sustainability in small business contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply digital solutions in a real SME context to address sustainability issues.

modules.name: Big Data for Environmental Intelligence (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Leverage big data technologies to analyze environmental patterns and trends (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify big data technologies applicable to environmental monitoring and analysis.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how large-scale data processing can enhance environmental intelligence.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement big data solutions to process and analyze environmental datasets.

modules.name: Ethics and Governance in Digital Innovation (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Evaluate ethical implications of digital systems and ensure inclusive governance (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify ethical considerations in digital innovation for sustainability.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain governance frameworks that support responsible technology deployment.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply ethical principles to evaluate sustainability technologies and initiatives.

modules.name: Big Data for Environmental Intelligence (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Leverage big data technologies to analyze environmental patterns and trends (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify big data technologies applicable to environmental monitoring and analysis.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how large-scale data processing can enhance environmental intelligence.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement big data solutions to process and analyze environmental datasets.

modules.name: Advanced Visualisation for Sustainability Reporting (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Create effective data visualizations to communicate sustainability performance (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify fundamental visualization techniques for sustainability data communication.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how visual representations can effectively communicate sustainability metrics.
learning_outcomes.skills: Create compelling visual narratives of sustainability performance for diverse stakeholders.

modules.name: Digital Resilience Strategies (EQF 4 Version)
modules.description: Building resilient digital systems and organizations to withstand sustainability challenges (This module has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify resilience principles and frameworks in digital sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how resilience thinking strengthens sustainability initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply resilience assessment tools to evaluate organization's capacity to withstand sustainability disruptions.

program_learning_outcomes: Apply fundamental digital sustainability principles and methodologies in structured environments
Utilize appropriate tools and technologies to support sustainability objectives in digital contexts
Demonstrate awareness of ethical and environmental implications of digital systems and decisions
Communicate sustainability concepts and practices effectively with diverse stakeholders
Implement basic sustainability improvements in digital systems and processes
